WITH RECURSIVE CTE AS ( SELECT 1 AS LEVEL, DEPT_ID AS ID, DEPT_NM AS TEXT, UP_DEPT_ID AS PARENT, 'unit' AS TYPE, SORT_NO FROM DEPARTMENT WHERE UP_DEPT_ID = '#'
UNION ALL
SELECT 1 + B.LEVEL AS LEVEL, A.DEPT_ID AS ID, A.DEPT_NM AS TEXT, A.UP_DEPT_ID AS PARENT, 'unit' AS TYPE, A.SORT_NO FROM DEPARTMENT A INNER JOIN CTE B ON A.UP_DEPT_ID = B.ID )
SELECT ID, TEXT, PARENT, TYPE FROM CTE ORDER BY LEVEL, SORT_NO

SELECT DEPT_ID, DEPT_NM, UP_DEPT_ID, (SELECT DEPT_ID FROM DEPARTMENT WHERE DEPT_ID = A.UP_DEPT_ID) UP_DEPT_ID, (SELECT DEPT_NM FROM DEPARTMENT WHERE DEPT_ID = A.UP_DEPT_ID) UP_DEPT_NM, SORT_NO, USE_YN FROM DEPARTMENT A WHERE DEPT_ID = #{deptId}
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM DEPARTMENT WHERE DEPT_ID = #{deptId}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO DEPARTMENT ( DEPT_ID, DEPT_NM, UP_DEPT_ID, SORT_NO, USE_YN ) VALUES( #{deptId}, #{deptNm}, #{upDeptId}, #{sortNo}, #{useYn} ) ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE DEPT_NM = #{deptNm}, SORT_NO = #{sortNo}, USE_YN = #{useYn}
